DOC.brief_summary: This single center , open-label study evaluate PK-PDE10A Enzyme Occupancy Relationship RO5545965 single dose healthy male volunteer positron emission tomography ( PET ) .
DOC.brief_title: A PET Study With RO5545965 Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject , 25 50 year age , inclusive ; healthy status define absence evidence active chronic disease Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 inclusive Male subject female partner childbearing potential must use two method contraception , one must barrier method ( i.e . condom ) , duration study 30 day last dose History clinically significant gastrointestinal , renal , hepatic , bronchopulmonary , neurological , psychiatric , cardiovascular , endocrinological , haematological allergic disease , metabolic disorder , cancer cirrhosis History clinically significant hypersensitivity allergic drug reaction Any suspicion history alcohol abuse and/or consumption drug abuse Regular smoker ( > 5 cigarette , > 1 pipeful > 1 cigar per day ) Positive hepatitis B , hepatitis C , HIV infection Evidence significant cardiovascular disease disorder Participation investigational drug device study within 3 month prior first administration study drug within 6 time elimination halflife , whichever longer Previous inclusion research and/or medical protocol clinical procedure involve nuclear medicine , PET , occupational exposure ionize radiation radiological investigation significant exposure radiation , exclude dental Xray common Xrays chest extremity Subject condition would prevent MRI accurately safely perform [ eg , claustrophobia , cardiac pacemaker , metallic implant clip ] Subject unable lie back PET MRI scanner period 90 minute Contraindication arterial cannulation Unsuitable vein repeat venipuncture
